author: Eric Nusbaum
title: The Story Behind Jackie Robinson’s Moving Testimony Before the House Un-American Activities Committee
description: On the morning of July 18, 1949, just six days after he played in his first All-Star Game, Robinson appeared before the House Un-American Activities Committee
